SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM client_company cc JOIN client_company_user ccu ON cc.client_company_id = ccu.client_company_id WHERE ccu.user_id = #{userId} AND cc.is_deleted = 'N' AND cc.created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL 30 DAY ) AS clientCompanyCount,
( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM influencer i WHERE i.user_id = #{userId} AND i.is_deleted = 'N' AND i.created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL 30 DAY ) AS influencerCount,
( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM contract c JOIN influencer i ON c.influencer_id = i.influencer_id WHERE i.user_id = #{userId} AND c.created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL 30 DAY ) AS contractCount,
( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pipeline p JOIN pipeline_user pu ON p.pipeline_id = pu.pipeline_id JOIN pipeline_step ps ON p.pipeline_step_id = ps.pipeline_step_id WHERE pu.user_id = #{userId} AND ps.step_name = '계약' AND p.created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL 30 DAY AND p.is_deleted = 'N' ) AS pipelineCount

SELECT cc.client_company_name, cc.telephone, cc.created_at, ccs.status_name FROM client_company cc JOIN client_company_status ccs ON cc.client_company_status_id = ccs.client_company_status_id JOIN client_company_user ccu ON cc.client_company_id = ccu.client_company_id WHERE cc.is_deleted = 'N' AND ccu.user_id = #{userId} AND cc.created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)

SELECT s.content, s.schedule_date, s.start_time, s.end_time, sc.hex_code FROM schedule s JOIN schedule_color sc ON s.schedule_color_id = sc.schedule_color_id WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} AND s.schedule_date = CURDATE()

SELECT p.pipeline_id, cc.client_company_name AS company_name, c.campaign_name, c.product_name, p.name AS listup_title, MAX(cm.name) AS client_manager_name, MAX(cm.position) AS client_manager_position FROM pipeline p JOIN pipeline_user pu ON pu.pipeline_id = p.pipeline_id JOIN campaign c ON p.campaign_id = c.campaign_id JOIN client_company cc ON c.client_company_id = cc.client_company_id JOIN pipeline_step ps ON p.pipeline_step_id = ps.pipeline_step_id LEFT JOIN pipeline_influencer_client_manager picm ON picm.pipeline_id = p.pipeline_id LEFT JOIN client_manager cm ON picm.client_manager_id = cm.client_manager_id WHERE pu.user_id = #{userId} AND ps.step_name = '리스트업' AND p.is_deleted = 'N' GROUP BY cc.client_company_name, c.campaign_name, p.name;

SELECT p.pipeline_id, cc.client_company_name AS company_name, c.campaign_name, c.product_name, p.name AS proposal_title, cm.name AS client_manager_name, cm.position AS client_manager_position, pss.status_name, p.created_at FROM pipeline p JOIN pipeline_user pu ON pu.pipeline_id = p.pipeline_id JOIN campaign c ON p.campaign_id = c.campaign_id JOIN client_company cc ON c.client_company_id = cc.client_company_id JOIN pipeline_step ps ON p.pipeline_step_id = ps.pipeline_step_id JOIN pipeline_status pss ON p.pipeline_status_id = pss.pipeline_status_id LEFT JOIN pipeline_influencer_client_manager picm ON picm.pipeline_id = p.pipeline_id LEFT JOIN client_manager cm ON picm.client_manager_id = cm.client_manager_id WHERE pu.user_id = #{userId} AND ps.step_name = '제안' AND p.is_deleted = 'N' GROUP BY cc.client_company_name, c.campaign_name, p.name;

SELECT p.pipeline_id, cc.client_company_name AS company_name, c.campaign_name, c.product_name, p.name AS contract_title, p.expected_revenue, p.expected_profit, pss.status_name, p.created_at FROM pipeline p JOIN pipeline_user pu ON pu.pipeline_id = p.pipeline_id JOIN campaign c ON p.campaign_id = c.campaign_id JOIN client_company cc ON c.client_company_id = cc.client_company_id JOIN pipeline_step ps ON p.pipeline_step_id = ps.pipeline_step_id JOIN pipeline_status pss ON p.pipeline_status_id = pss.pipeline_status_id LEFT JOIN pipeline_influencer_client_manager picm ON picm.pipeline_id = p.pipeline_id WHERE pu.user_id = #{userId} AND ps.step_name = '계약' AND p.is_deleted = 'N' GROUP BY cc.client_company_name, c.campaign_name, p.name;

SELECT p.pipeline_id, cc.client_company_name AS company_name, c.campaign_name, c.product_name, p.name AS quotation_title, picm.ad_price, p.expected_revenue, p.expected_profit, p.created_at FROM pipeline p JOIN pipeline_user pu ON pu.pipeline_id = p.pipeline_id JOIN campaign c ON p.campaign_id = c.campaign_id JOIN client_company cc ON c.client_company_id = cc.client_company_id JOIN pipeline_step ps ON p.pipeline_step_id = ps.pipeline_step_id LEFT JOIN pipeline_influencer_client_manager picm ON picm.pipeline_id = p.pipeline_id WHERE pu.user_id = #{userId} AND ps.step_name = '견적' AND p.is_deleted = 'N' GROUP BY cc.client_company_name, c.campaign_name, p.name;
